Secrets? WTL maybe... welcome to my thoughts

Honestly, this doesn't have a point. I might put small text pieces here when I feel like it. There's no point to reading any of it, honestly.

Post 2: breathing

i find it hard to breath sometimes. More like all the time.
it kind of hurts. like i'm constantly drowning but also about to puke.
sometimes i fantasize about just taking a knife and splitting my throat open.
maybe then I'll be able to breathe. maybe then this overwhelming pressure will be gone, maybe then i will feel free. maybe then i'll be motivated. maybe then i'll have a dream again. maybe then i'll be happy.

2018/02/26
